casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. JAMES C. SERVELLO

MCDONALD, C. J., and KATZ, SULLIVAN and VERTEFEUILLE, Js., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Jon Schoenhom, in support of the petition. Harry Weller, senior assistant state’s attorney, in opposition. Decided October 25, 2000

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
